verses.en: By the fig and the olive

verses.ar: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ
verses.en: We have certainly created man in the best of stature
Then We return him to the lowest of the low

verses.ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ
verses.en: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted
So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense
Is not Allah the most just of judges
